subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Williams, an 18-time major winner, did not show any first-round jitters, and Djokovic, a four-time Australian Open champion, shrugged off a cold in matches on Tuesday.
snippet: Williams, an 18-time major winner, did not show any first-round jitters, and Djokovic, a four-time Australian Open champion, shrugged off a cold in matches on Tuesday.
